overview:
CEO and Founder of JusCollege.com

For more than ten years, Andrew Citores has been starting and running businesses focusing his efforts on event planning, entertainment, sales, and transportation. Andrew has started five profitable companies

Andrew was Born and raised in Northern California and attended Bellarmine College Preparatory. Andrew moved to Los Angeles in 2006 to attend Loyola Marymount University for several years before taking a leave of absence to start LA Hopper, LLC, a transportation and entertainment company based in Los Angeles, California. The company boomed. In late 2009 Andrew founded Juscollege.com, an online college concierge company with services, products, time management tools, and social features - all targeted to specific college and university networks. The site will be launching the end of September.
